page.title: 07DEEPING ST.JAMES SCHOOLS
page.content: { The Linchfield School}employs 17 full-time and part-time staff,and has 245 children. It was built in September 1980. The school has few facilities and is in need of more space. There are various fund-raising activities held at the school. {The Deeping St.James School}has 430 pupils and employs 32 full-time and part-time staff and was built in 1968. The facilities of the school are very good and the school has many fund-raising activities held by the children's parents. {The Deepings Comprehensive School has 1,050 children and 65 full-time and part-time staff. It was built in 1957 and has the use of the Leisure Centre. The school has got facilities such as Science laboratories and a Design block. The DSA holds Dances, Raffles and Fetes for the school.
